about_the_game:
This message is from Sweet Atita:


This is your first mission to liberate Tubercle City! You must pay attention to my instructions to understand how to defeat the Vegangsters. Here is a guide to the cards that will be very useful for you:



Plus, you'll get to know us! The Atita brothers, two brothers who joined forces to defeat all the criminals in the city! You will play as Patt, and I, Sweet will be your guide on your adventure through the streets of Tubercle City!



Immerse yourself in a combat system based on card speed: master the timing of each enemy's actions to establish a winning strategy!



Get to know some of your neighbours by having conversations with them. Each event on the map will give you access to regain life or buy cards to improve your deck.





Everything you'll find in the final game

  • Create different types of decks! More than 100 cards that will allow you to build them according to your play style.
  • Card usage and enemy actions are determined by speed! Master this dynamic speed system to put your strategic timing skills to the test.
  • Interrogate all the citizens! Up to 60 unique characters that roam the streets of Tubercle City.
  • Unlock new zones! The city is formed by 6 playable zones, each one with its own culture, society and rules.
  • Equip several gadgets! Throughout the city you will discover powerful items that improve your deck and may create interesting synergies...
  • Investigate every neighborhood! Like the great detective that you are, you must discover every last citizen and card there is.

name: Vegangsters Demo
short_description: Fight your way through this deck-building roguelike with real-time mechanics, in the demo you will have to save the city's first neighbourhood. Fight against the worst criminals in a series of turn-based battles determined by the speed of your cards.
